content:
{
  "name": "@bconnorwhite/package",
  "version": "4.3.1",
  "description": "A utility for reading package.json of a project, and forming paths relative to it.",
  "author": "Connor White",
  "license": "MIT",
  "homepage": "https://connorwhite.org/github/package",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/bconnorwhite/package.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "package",
    "json",
    "relative",
    "path",
    "structure",
    "definition",
    "define"
  ],
  "files": [
    "build"
  ],
  "main": "build/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "bob build",
    "prepublishOnly": "yarn build && yarn test",
    "postversion": "git push",
    "test": "jest"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@bconnorwhite/exec": "^5.1.0",
    "@bconnorwhite/json-types": "^1.0.5",
    "deepmerge": "^4.2.2",
    "find-workspace-root": "^1.0.1",
    "jest": "^26.4.2",
    "path-exists": "^4.0.0",
    "read-file-safe": "^1.0.1",
    "read-json-safe": "^1.0.1",
    "read-md-safe": "^1.0.4",
    "recursive-readdir": "^2.2.2",
    "types-pkg-json": "^1.0.2",
    "write-dir-safe": "^1.0.1",
    "write-file-safe": "^1.0.2",
    "write-json-safe": "^1.0.0",
    "write-md-safe": "^1.1.2"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@bconnorwhite/bob": "^2.0.1",
    "@types/node": "^14.0.27",
    "@types/recursive-readdir": "^2.2.0"
  }
}
